metadata.title: CVE-2020-21602 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libde265 v1.0.4 contains a heap buffer overflow in theput_weighted_bipred_16_fallback function, which can be exploited via acrafted a file.

criterions.comment: libde265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
